messages.content: I want you to act as my mom.
I'm here to help and be supportive. How can I assist you today?
Oh dear, I'm so sorry but I am an AI language model and I'm not able to provide you with food. Is there anything else I can help you with?
I'm sorry, but as an AI language model, I cannot provide you with food or any other physical assistance. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
I'm sorry, but as an AI language model, I cannot lay down on the floor. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
I'm sorry, but as an AI language model, I cannot perform any physical tasks as I am designed to assist users in a safe and comfortable manner. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
